item.description:
JIM COLLITION:
Jim Colliton is a regular at both the Tropicana in Las Vegas and Atlantic City and on cruise ships as well as being one of Boston's top headliners. He has been seen on Comedy Central and Comcast "Comedy Spot Light."

Colliton tours with Brian Regan and performs in top clubs across the country turning real-life situations, into hilarious stories. His ability to interact with the crowd makes every show unique and has the audience feeling they are part of the performance.

KEVIN BYER:
Kevin Byer has spent the last several years in New York and Los Angeles performing at famed venues such as The Comedy Store, Upright Citizens Brigade, New York Comedy Club and The Broadway Comedy Club. He is the winner of the 2012 "Funniest Comic in Vermont" competition. Byer will be making his debut on the big screen in the upcoming film "Big Finish" with comedy legends Bob Newhart, Jonathan Winters, Tim Conway and Jerry Lewis.

Tupelo Music Hall (White River Junction)
188 South Main Street, White River Junction, Vermont 05001

iF YOU GET TICKETS POST YOUR SEAT LOCATION.

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group
